articles.title: Williamsburg police arrest 10 people on narcotics charges
articles.description: Ten people were arrested for narcotics distribution charges following a months-long investigation, Williamsburg police said Tuesday.

articles.title: Williamsburg police arrest 10 people, including 8 William & Mary students and a professor, on narcotics charges
articles.description: Ten people - including eight William & Mary students and a professor - were arrested on narcotics distribution charges following a months-long investigation, Williamsburg police said Tuesday.
